Class AbsDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbsDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Device
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Headphones, Laptop, Printer, Tablet, Tv
    public class AbsDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Device
    AbsDevice.java
    AbsDevice represents an abstract implementation of a device.
    It implements the Device interface providing basic functionalities such as setting and getting category, name, price, and quantity, as well as methods for managing stock.
